--- title: MantisShrimp keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Built on top of pytorch-lightining, `MantisShrimp` is an object detection framework focused on application." description: "Built on top of pytorch-lightining, `MantisShrimp` is an object detection framework focused on application." ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

MantisShrimp is in very early development, all contributions are welcome!

Be sure to check the issues board =)

Install 

pip install -U 'git+https://github.com/cocodataset/cocoapi.git#subdirectory=PythonAPI'
pip install mantisshrimp

How to use

Check the examples folder for a ton of usage cases. It should be very easy to get started.
